name: SuperheroStory
0:
”Alexa, start Superhero Story”
”Alexa, open Superhero Story”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: superhero story
des: This is a simple mad-libs type story designed for preschoolers and kindergartners. They get to choose a superhero, a bad guy, a location, and a crime, then Alexa will read them a story with funny sound effects and expressions based on what your kid told her. Kids can use well known superheroes and villains, or can make up their own superheroes and villains.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
